entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Timmins
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:29 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Timmins Victor Power Airport 12:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 50 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -9.7°C
Wind: E 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this afternoon then snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h. High plus 2. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming north 20 late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
